question: Khalifa Bin Salman Al Khalifa, who passed away recently, was the Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
Khalifa bin Salman al-Khalifa, the Prince of Bahrain the world's longest-serving Prime minister, has recently passed away.
The Prince, who had held the post since independence in 1971, has passed away at the age of 84. He played a significant role in the political and economic affairs of Bahrain for more than three decades.
